text: Alexis Arias (born 18 October 1969) is a Cuban rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Villa Clara Province Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1991 Pan American Games Category:Rowers at the 1995 Pan American Games
title: Alexis Arias (rower)
